Genre: Drama
Year: 2006
Country: USA
Runtime: 89 min
Director: Murray Robinson
Cast:

.: Plot :.
The life of a young Jesuit seminarian is turned upside down when he falls in love with a young woman while working as a volunteer at a soup kitchen.
